Reply Most Illustrious and Most Excellent Sir

On the 29th of last month, I received the official letter and decree from Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Most Excellent Sir João Manuel de Lima e Silva, to whom, with the same regret that now accompanies me, I found myself compelled to refuse such a request, which is so just for the security of the proclaimed system. I have estates from which I have already rendered some, as Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency  
Fazenda do Salso, 1st of July, 1837.  
Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães

[On folio 1v. of document CV-212]
